entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as feeling sick and wanting to move. He is described as saying 'I feel sick'.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is introduced as a poltergeist who is not like the other ghosts around them. He is described as wearing a bright orange party hat and a revolving bow-tie.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as saying 'No thanks' to Peeves' offer of peanuts. She is also described as whispering frantically to Peeves not to tell Myrtle what she said.

entities.name: myrtle
entities.description: Myrtle is introduced as a ghost who has the glummest face Harry has ever seen. Hermione is worried about what she might say if Peeves tells her what Hermione said.

relationships.description: Peeves addresses Myrtle by shouting 'OY! MYRTLE!'
Hermione warns Peeves not to tell Myrtle what she said.
Peeves interacts with Ron by swooping in front of him and offering him peanuts.
